thread.title: I got a great deal to stay here my birthday weekend
thread.title_full: I got a great deal to stay here my birthday weekend - Review of Holiday Inn Manhattan - Financial District, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kenneth P
title: I got a great deal to stay here my birthday weekend
text: The hotel is close to the subway which makes it ideal to visit anywhere you would like to go in the city. The room size was small but just the right size for my wife and I. The rooms were very very clean. I felt very comfortable because of this. The staff are always pleasant. The entire property is clean and modern. I honestly have no complaints. But the best part is this was the cheapest stay I have ever had in NYC in over 10 years of visiting the city!
